scripts.setup-check: node -e "const dotenv=require('dotenv'); dotenv.config(); const mysql=require('mysql2'); const db=mysql.createConnection({host:process.env.DB_HOST, user:process.env.DB_USER, password:process.env.DB_PASS, database:process.env.DB_NAME, port:process.env.DB_PORT}); db.connect(err => {if(err){console.error('❌ Gagal:', err.message); process.exit(1)} console.log('✅ Berhasil!'); process.exit(0)})"
